title: Shame-Based Discipline
description: A short lesson to help you apply Shame-Based Discipline.

hook.text: 'Bad boy!' Two words that attack identity instead of addressing behavior.

buildup.text: Shame-based discipline tells a child there's something wrong with who they are, not what they did.
